thread.title: Debenhams cut 96% off £5,500 diamond watch as shoppers call it 'bargain of the century'
thread.title_full: Debenhams cut 96% off £5,500 diamond watch as shoppers call it 'bargain of the century'

title: Debenhams cut 96% off £5,500 diamond watch as shoppers call it 'bargain of the century'
text:
The Debenhams sale is offering customers a huge 97 per cent off the GV2 Bari Diamond Swiss Quartz Watch from luxury brand Gevril, which has been described as 'beautiful; If you're still feeling the pinch from all the festive spending but are eager to dazzle at your next big event, Debenhams has got your back with a eye-watering deal on designer watches. The retailer has slashed a whopping 96 per cent off the price of the luxurious GV2 Bari Diamond Swiss Quartz Watch by Gevril.
This "stunning" accessory, usually priced at a hefty £5,495, can now be yours for a mere £238.
This chic watch is part of the coveted GV2 Bari Collection, taking inspiration from the enchanting Italian city. It features a "sophisticated" rectangular mother-of-pearl dial that's adorned with 18 sparkling diamond indices.

Plus, it comes with a stylish two-tone bracelet, a dazzling…
